Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO.1 YAOJIAYUAN SOUTH ROAD,NEWLINK CENTER, AREA G, BUILDING 7, HUITONG TIMES SQUARE, BEIJING, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Naas Technology Inc, formerly RISE Education Cayman Ltd, is a holding company. The Company, through its subsidiaries, offer one-stop EV charging solutions to charging stations. The Company is mainly engaged in three businesses. The online EV charging solutions mainly include an integrated set of online solutions to charging stations that mainly includes mobility connectivity services. The offline EV charging solutions mainly include a range of offline solutions to charging stations, ranging from site selection, hardware procurement, engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC), station maintenance, energy storage, to customer support and others. The innovative and other solutions mainly include electricity procurement services.
